video.title: Beauty & the Beast
video.synopsis: A homicide detective and a veteran who has been turned into a beast by a military experiment gone awry become allies after they meet by chance.

episodes.synopsis: When she was a teen, Catherine Chandler witnessed the murder of her mother. Cat would have been killed too, but someone, or something, saved her.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: While Cat investigates the mysterious death of a rising young ballerina, Vincent senses that her understudy is hiding information.
episodes.title: Proceed With Caution

episodes.synopsis: Cat and Tess arrest a Bosnian immigrant named Iris, whom they suspect killed an immigration judge for deporting her brother.
episodes.title: All In

episodes.synopsis: Vincent revives a 19-year-old victim who was beaten and left for dead inside a dumpster. As he lies in a coma, Cat and Tess question his father.
episodes.title: Basic Instinct

episodes.synopsis: On a late night walk with JT, Vincent stops a convenience store robbery, only to learn that a surveillance video captured his good deed.
episodes.title: Saturn Returns

episodes.synopsis: Cat wonders whether Vincent is keeping his distance due to the kiss she shared with Evan at her birthday party.
episodes.title: Worth

episodes.synopsis: Cat investigates the murder of a college fraternity brother, and JT examines Vincent to find the cause of his increasingly frequent blackouts.
episodes.title: Out Of Control

episodes.synopsis: While Cat and Tess investigate the attempted murder of a teen pop star, JT suspects that Catherine is triggering Vincent's fugue states.
episodes.title: Trapped

episodes.synopsis: A dateless Cat confides to Vincent that she wishes he could go with her to her father's wedding. But she learns something surprising at the reception.
episodes.title: Bridesmaid Up!

episodes.synopsis: Worried that he'll be exposed as the Beast, Vincent leaves an unconscious Cat in the road so that Evan can get her to the hospital.
episodes.title: Seeing Red

episodes.synopsis: Cat focuses on her physical recovery after being shot. But she can't return to duty until she gets the approval of a police department therapist.
episodes.title: On Thin Ice

episodes.synopsis: Cat tells Tess and Heather that she's ready to move on with her life in spite of her feelings for Vincent, whose identity she's still protecting.
episodes.title: Cold Turkey

episodes.synopsis: Vincent wants to reconnect with Cat and vows to regain her trust, but she doubts she can trust him again after he left her for Alex.
episodes.title: Trust No One

episodes.synopsis: Heather catches Vincent kissing Catherine, who decides that the best way to disarm Heather's curiosity is to have Vincent over for dinner.
episodes.title: Tough Love

episodes.synopsis: A new assistant district attorney arrives at the precinct, suspicious that cases involving the vigilante are being mishandled.
episodes.title: Any Means Possible

episodes.synopsis: Vincent and Cat take their relationship to a new level, but their intimate moment is shattered when Catherine is called to a crime scene.
episodes.title: Insatiable

episodes.synopsis: Cat tends to Vincent's wounds when Tess shoots him, and JT shoots Tess with a tranquilizer gun to stop her escape.
episodes.title: Partners In Crime

episodes.synopsis: Heartbroken by Cat's relationship with Vincent, Evan reveals the location of the Beast's lair to Muirfield operative Kyle.
episodes.title: Heart Of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Gabe reveals to Cat that Muirfield experimented on him as a child. Against Vincent's wishes, Cat teams up with Gabe to track down a server farm.
episodes.title: Playing With Fire

episodes.synopsis: On the anniversary of her mom's death, Cat bumps into Gabe at the gravesite and discovers that Vanessa smuggled Gabe out of Muirfield as a child.
episodes.title: Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: After a pregnancy scare, Cat and Vincent ponder what kind of future they could have. Gabe is under guard at a hotel after an attempt on his life.
episodes.title: Date Night

episodes.synopsis: While under the influence of Gabe's pills, Vincent can't beast out -- and the effects will be permanent if not reversed soon.
episodes.title: Never Turn Back

episodes.synopsis: Three months after Vincent Keller was abducted by Muirfield, Det. Catherine Chandler is reunited with him -- but not in the way she planned.
episodes.title: Who Am I?

episodes.synopsis: While attempting to learn more about Vincent's mission, Cat gets kidnapped by him, prompting Tess, J.T. and Gabe to come together to help Cat.
episodes.title: Kidnapped

episodes.synopsis: Catherine and Vincent track a mysterious beast while keeping their individual agendas from each other. Meanwhile, Heather has a revelation for Cat.
episodes.title: Liar, Liar

episodes.synopsis: In his quest to track down a suspected beast, Gabe enlists Vincent's help, but Vincent quickly takes matters into his own hands.
episodes.title: Hothead

episodes.synopsis: When Cat attends her high school reunion, she uncovers more of her past than she anticipated. Meanwhile, Vincent meets up with an old military buddy.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Cat confronts her birth father about the mysterious role he's played in her life, while Vincent has to neutralize a high-profile beast.
episodes.title: Father Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: True feelings are revealed and secrets are outed when Gabe and Tori join Cat, Vincent and Cat's father, for Thanksgiving.
episodes.title: Guess Who’s Coming to Dinner?

episodes.synopsis: Vincent and Cat find themselves at odds on how to deal with agent Reynolds, and this forces Vincent to wonder if he is more beast than man.
episodes.title: Man or Beast?

episodes.synopsis: To prevent Vincent from further injury, Cat helps protect Tori when her life is threatened, revealing a new, unexpected mystery.
episodes.title: Don’t Die on Me

episodes.synopsis: Vincent goes on a national talk show to reveal he is still alive, while Cat dives into an undercover case for FBI agent Dana Landon.
episodes.title: Ancestors

episodes.synopsis: A group of criminals holds Cat, Tori and Tess hostage at the precinct, and Vincent must risk exposing his identity to rescue them.
episodes.title: Held Hostage

episodes.synopsis: Cat and Vincent must work together to save J.T. when he gets kidnapped. Meanwhile, a stranger from FBI agent Dana Landon's past surfaces.
episodes.title: Recipe for Disaster

episodes.synopsis: When Cat has to work with Vincent on Valentine's Day, she's forced to evaluate whether she wants to be in a relationship with Gabe.
episodes.title: Till Death

episodes.synopsis: While searching for some of Gabe's missing acquaintances, Vincent sees what his life could have been when he visits the hospital where he interned.
episodes.title: Redemption

episodes.synopsis: Torn between her current boyfriend and her ex, Cat finds her decision further complicated when she and Vincent end up in a compromising situation.
episodes.title: Catch Me If You Can

episodes.synopsis: To prevent Sam from destroying a large group of people, Cat and Vincent are forced to revisit a romantic destination from their past.
episodes.title: About Last Night

episodes.synopsis: When Vincent is arrested for murder, Cat and the team work to clear his name but realize they have a bigger problem when they learn who turned him in.
episodes.title: Beast Is the New Black

episodes.synopsis: Cat's sister drops by for a surprise visit just as Gabe suspends Cat and Tess from the squad in an effort to force Vincent out of hiding.
episodes.title: Cold Case

episodes.synopsis: Cat and Vincent take agent Knox's offer to extricate themselves and lead normal lives -- but forces out of their control conspire against them.
episodes.title: Ever After

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to start over with Cat, Gabe tries to woo her by arranging a romantic date. She has plans of her own, however, about how to save Vincent.
episodes.title: Operation Fake Date

episodes.synopsis: Cat searches for a way to thwart Gabe and finds her answer in an unexpected place: her ancestor's journal, which yields a troubling solution.
episodes.title: Déjà Vu
